name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-aad-implicitflow
title: Azure Active Directory implicit flow authentication samples
shortDescription: Sample SharePoint Framework web parts built using React illustrating different scenarios using implicit OAuth flow with Azure Active Directory.
longDescription: Sample SharePoint Framework web parts built using React illustrating different scenarios using implicit OAuth flow with Azure Active Directory.

thumbnails.alt: Azure Active Directory implicit flow authentication samples

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
